title: Ticket #3215: condor_userlog not considering ULOG_JOB_RECONNECT_FAILED event
description:
condor_userlog does not seem to handle all the needed events when parsing the userlog.

In particular, ULOG_JOB_RECONNECT_FAILED is not considered at all (a relatively frequent event in glidein deployments).

Some job execution events are thus ignored.
remarks:
Nathan, could you please review, and if acceptable, commit?

I have tested it in the master branch, but I think this should go into v7_8 as well.

2012-Aug-29 09:39:22 by nwp:
Igor, I will commit this. Looking at the patch and trying to figure out where event gets deleted makes me cry for shared_ptr (Not your fault, just an observation about the general state of the code).

2012-Sep-01 10:07:13 by nwp:
Need to find a reviewer for this...

2013-Jan-07 16:28:11 by johnkn:
change looks ok to me.
